objects.text:
• Premium Faux Leather
• Spacious Interior Design
• Gold-tone Hardware
• Stylish Charm Details

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
The banner showcases a premium fashion handbag with a clean, elegant layout split into left and right sections. On the left, the text layers—**brand_name**, **heading**, and **subheading**—present the brand, product title, and a brief tagline. Below, the **description** text block outlines product highlights using bullet points. Prominently featured is a large **price** layer, followed by a **cta_button** containing a **cta** text label encouraging user interaction. The right side visually balances the layout with a centrally placed **product_image** depicting the handbag. The background is engaging with soft geometric lines, faded decorative shapes, and a quadrant layout. 

Color Palette:
- Warm Beige (#F9F5F0)
- Muted Blush (#E8D5C4)
- Taupe Brown (#6B4226)
- Gold Accent (#A67C52)
- Soft Caramel (#D4A276)
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated and elegant handbag in a soft camel brown color (#B78E76), paired with minimalistic gold-tone hardware accents (#D4AF37). The color palette for an advertisement banner should blend luxurious neutrals and metallics: camel brown (#B78E76), soft beige (#F5EBDD), warm cream (#FFF9F0), deep coffee brown (#6B4C3B), and gold (#D4AF37). The bag's textured surface subtly reflects light, enhancing the depth of the brown shade, while the metallic embellishments stand out with a polished finish. These elements create a refined contrast, emphasizing quality and style, suitable for a minimalist yet premium banner design.
